product_name: Eagle Creek Silk Undercover Neck Wallet
long_description: The Eagle Creek Silk Undercover Neck Wallet keeps valuables hidden under clothing while traveling. Silk construction is extra soft and comfortable. Adjustable cord on the Silk Undercover allows you to wear it over your shoulder, around your neck or around your waist. Naturally breathable silk is lightweight, soft next to skin, fast-drying and ultra-durable; soft seam construction enhances comfort. Secure important items in the 2 zippered compartments. Additional items can be stored in the small back pocket.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Silk Undercover Neck Wallet keeps valuables hidden under clothing while traveling. Silk construction is extra soft and comfortable.
